nodes.text: Saul Rouse was a Human male criminal who lived during the Galactic Civil War. He was one of the founders of the Sand Splitters, a criminal organization on Tatooine, along with Erib Kurrugh. During this time, he operated out of the Sand Splitter Cave on Tatooine. Circa 1 ABY, the Sand Splitters infiltrated Jabba's Palace and stole from Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Saul Rouse and Erib Kurrugh were killed by Jabba's henchmen sent by Ree-Yees.

Saul Rouse was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
